nodes.text: The Clone Wars: Jedi Heroes is a Level 3 DK Readers book written by Clare Hibbert that was published in 2010. The book follows the adventures of Anakin and his Jedi companions, including some all-new characters from Season 2 of Star Wars: The Clone Wars!

DK Readers team up with Star Wars and Star Wars: The Clone Wars yet again to get Padawans excited to read! Perfect for reluctant readers as well as devoted Star Wars and Star Wars: The Clone Wars fans, DK's Star Wars Readers have sold over 2.5 million units!
Jedi Heroes follows the adventures of Anakin and his Jedi companions, including some all-new characters from Season 2 of Star Wars: The Clone Wars!'
